TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ISelectionItemProvider

summary.span: 公開方法和屬性，以支援使用者介面自動化用戶端存取可實作 之容器的個別可選取子控制項。

span.span: Exposes methods and properties to support UI Automation client access to individual, selectable child controls of containers that implement .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在必須支援的 UI 自動化提供者上實作控制項模式。Implemented on a UI Automation provider that must support the control pattern.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void AddToSelection() cil managed

summary.span: 將目前的項目加入至選取項目的集合。

span.span: Adds the current element to the collection of selected items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果呼叫的結果的單一項目已選取，則傳送該項目; 否則傳送或依適當情況。If the result of a call to is that a single item is selected, then send an for that element; otherwise send an or as appropriate. > [!NOTE] > 此規則不依存容器是否允許單一或多個選取項目，或在哪一個方法用來變更選取項目。This rule does not depend on whether the container allows single or multiple selections, or on what method was used to change the selection. 結果只會影響結果。Only the result matters. ## Examples 下列範例程式碼會將項目加入至選取的項目集合。The following example code adds the item to a collection of selected items. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void RemoveFromSelection() cil managed

summary.span: 從選取項目的集合移除目前的項目。

span.span: Removes the current element from the collection of selected items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳送依適當情況。Send an as appropriate. > [!NOTE] > 此規則不依存容器是否允許單一或多個選取項目，或在哪一個方法用來變更選取項目。This rule does not depend on whether the container allows single or multiple selections, or on what method was used to change the selection. 結果只會影響結果。Only the result matters. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會移除選取的項目集合中的項目。The following example code removes the item from a collection of selected items. summary.span: 取消選取任何已選取的項目，然後選取目前的項目。

span.span: Deselects any selected items and then selects the current element.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例程式碼清除選取項目的集合中的所有項目，然後加入此項。The following example code clears all items from the collection of selected items and then adds this one. summary.span: 取得實作 且做為呼叫物件之容器的使用者介面自動化提供者。
